name: Plackett-Luce
title: MM algorithms for generalized Bradley-Terry models
author: Hunter, D. R.
summary: The Minorization Maximization algorithm for the Plackett-Luce model.

parameter.name: max_iterations
parameter.description: Provides the maximum number of iterations for the Minorization Maximazation algorithm.

parameter.name: norm_tolerance
parameter.description: The tolerance between the norm of the difference between the new and the older gamma in the Minorization Maximazation iteration.

parameter.name: log_likelihood_tolerance
parameter.description: The tolerance between the last and the new Log-Likelihood in the Minorization Maximazation algorithm.
